system.description: Your consuming hatred for a specific group grants you bonuses against them in combat, though it clouds your judgment when dealing with these hated foes.
system.notes: X = specific group (Daemons, Mutants, Xenos, etc.)
system.benefit: The Character despises a group or organisation that has wronged them. Gain +10 to all Weapon Skill Tests made against this group. The character finds it difficult to back down from a fight with this foe, and must make a Willpower Test to retreat or surrender to them when fighting, unless Massively outnumbered and outclassed. Groups Include: Chaos Space Marines, Daemons, Mutants, Psykers, Xenos (specific), Criminals, Rogue Trader (specific), Pirates, other
